definition: wooden bench or stool/CL:張|张[zhang1],條|条[tiao2]
to catch sight of in a doorway (old)
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious
to hold an inconsequential job/to receive a cold reception/to be kept waiting for an assignment or audience/to be out in the cold/to be sidelined/to warm the bench/to cool one's heels

sentences.english: 's point-guard corps. Tim Duncan's inside-outside game effectively puts Bynum on the bench.
sentences.chinese: 邓肯在比赛中的巨大效用会把安猪牢牢地按在板凳上。

sentences.english: Sitting on a bare bench, they talked on and on.
sentences.chinese: 坐在一个白茬儿板凳上说个没完。

sentences.english: Later, the old couple began to feel sorry for her and brought her out a small stool.
sentences.chinese: 后来，老夫妻竟有些过意不去，给她拿出一只小板凳。

sentences.english: Miller was riding the bench in Saturday's game.
sentences.chinese: 星期六的比赛米勒在坐冷板凳。

sentences.english: The Lakers have a starter coming off the bench in Jordan Farmar, giving them a trio of excellence in the backcourt.
sentences.chinese: 从板凳席上站起来的法玛，在后场给球队再添三把火。

sentences.english: Because of his bad performance, he became a bench warmer for the rest of the basketball season.
sentences.chinese: 因为他表现不好，剩下的季赛他就只好坐冷板凳。

sentences.english: Do it now or JVG will sit your ass on the bench.
sentences.chinese: 现在开始投篮吧，否则范甘迪会让你坐倒板凳上去。

sentences.english: Span could only see Synder putting on a show with his ass on the bench.
sentences.chinese: 而斯潘却只能坐在板凳上看着斯奈德在场上表演。

sentences.english: Some of them will still make millions to spend their lives on a bench.
sentences.chinese: 很多人还是会拿着百万年薪坐在板凳席上。

sentences.english: I don't doubt that he benched 385 lbs.
sentences.chinese: 我不怀疑他板凳三八五英镑。

sentences.english: Guangdong Hongyuan Club General Manager the Liu Hong boundary sits on the backless stool mat, sighs .
sentences.chinese: 广东宏远俱乐部总经理刘宏疆坐在板凳席上，感叹道。

sentences.english: Miller was the steal of free agency for Miami as he very much beefs up what would have been a lacking second-unit.
sentences.chinese: 米勒的加入会很大程度增强迈阿密所缺少的板凳实力。

sentences.english: Benches sure have lots of energy but they are too raw to compete.
sentences.chinese: 板凳球员确实有激情，但是他们太生涩，不能胜任。

sentences.english: Oh there's our table and benches.
sentences.chinese: 哦那是我们的桌子和长板凳。

sentences.english: Flash back to his sophomore year at the University of Michigan, when he was spending a lot of time on the bench.
sentences.chinese: 大学二年级的时候，他在板凳上耗掉大部分时间。

sentences.english: It's difficult to leave players on the bench who are playing extraordinarily well.
sentences.chinese: 把发挥得非常好的球员摁在替补板凳上可不容易。

definition: summer sleeping mat (e.g. of woven split bamboo)/CL:張|张[zhang1],領|领[ling3]
old-fashioned square table to seat eight people
to replace (a damaged component with a new one, an injured player with a substitute player, full-time workers with casual workers etc)/a substitute/a replacement
troop arrangement/battle formation/lineup (of a sports team etc)
